{
    "name": "mysql-cdc-connector",
    "config": {
        "connector.class": "io.debezium.connector.mysql.MySqlConnector",
        "tasks.max": "1",
        "database.hostname": "mysql_demo", //"host.docker.internal" (this will also work fine as exposed on host machine port)
        "database.port": "3306",
        "database.user": "debezium",
        "database.password": "Dbz12345!",
        "database.server.id": "184054",
        "database.server.name": "mysql_server",
        "database.include.list": "testdb",
        "table.include.list": "testdb.users",
        "database.history.kafka.bootstrap.servers": "kafka:9092",
        "database.history.kafka.topic": "schema-changes.testdb",
        "include.schema.changes": "true",
        "database.allowPublicKeyRetrieval": "true",
        "database.useSSL": "false"
    }
}
